author: Iain Lennon
comment: Does what it says. Unfortunately the phone preview does not accurately represent what you get on the watch (placement of date for example: position and font don't carry over properly). Would like more date options (date only, date in a box). I am sure this will get better though!
title: Reasonable

author: Brendan Greene
comment: PLEASE please add the ability to search for terms in the shared watch face section. If I want a "ferrari" watch face, it'd be MUCH faster to search for it then scroll through thousands. GREAT app otherwise. I love the customization capabilities and it usually has very accurate watch faces that update flawlessly.
title: One missing feature for me

author: Skyler Wallace
comment: Much more customizable than I anticipated 😊 Apple, if you're reading this, maybe you should let the owners of your products customize their devices.  I think you'd be jealous of what I made.
title: I've had this app for 3 minutes

comment: I really love this app. I use this for my Moto 360. Very customizable and easy to use. It's much, much better than I thought it would be. I haven't had any problems operating it or  downloading presets. It's very cool and I highly recommend this. 👍👍👍
title: Really Cool App!

author: Daniel Wenzel
comment: In addition, shows incorrect information on watch.  Example: Text 0 / Watch 1.  For the most part I enjoy this app.  Please fix these bugs and you will get 5 stars.
title: Shuts down intermittently

author: Tyler Roach
comment: I updated to 5 stars because it works now on asus zenwatch. Only feature id like to have added is to choose the ambient picture. I have a black and white image of my watch face that I would like to use when it goes into ambient mode.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Tyler,

Could you please send us an email? We will be happy to assist you and fix this issue.

Regards

title: Crashed asus

author: Judd Starr
comment: I bought this to use my own background images, but it doesn't work at all. My whole objective was to create my own watch faces. Useless. I'm tired of these scams. These guys can advertise whatever they want, take your money and make it virtually impossible to get a refund. Google needs to protect its customer base.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Please, if you don't like our watchface, send us an email with order number and we will make refund for you. update: tell us what doesn't work for you.

author: Trea Huggs
comment: No option for full ambient mode to have a different "blank" background so either waste battery life or go without so info in ambient mode. Also after you set a background from a picture no way to go back to solid color. Also have the issue of app status not reflecting phone display. Phone battery 12%, app shows 12% watch face shows 31%. Developer abandoned app.
title: Nice options but still lacking

author: Debra Pate
comment: I love the fact I can customize my watch faces. The only thing I don't like is I have to look at my watch to place the icons and time in the right spot. The watch doesn't look anything like the picture in the app. But still like it.

author: Josh Basarab
comment: I want this app to work so bad...  But the Battery is usually not accurate, can't figure out what would fix that, and the weather is ALWAYS at 82 degrees.  I live in South Florida where the weather is almost NEVER 82 degrees.  I think I'm going to have to stop using this app and choose a better one.  Makes me kinda sad.  And a look over at their website it looks like the developer has abandonded this app, so be careful what you do here.

author: Mike May
comment: I absolutely love it.  Can we get heart rate and steps added for functionality??  Also, adding animation to background would be ultimately amazing too!  Search functionality would be cool in the shared area.  Also, Moto 360 2nd Gen doesn't match screen designer and have to look at watch constantly to see changes.
title: So far amazing!!!

author: Luis Rosado
comment: Only worked one time with my LG Urbane and then.......nothing, it crashes every time. I wasted my money
title: It crashes......crashes.....

author: Kevin Rys
comment: Looks to be easy to use and a lot of nice presets, but crashes right away when I try to use it on my new LG G Watch Urbane. I will update my review if a patch is made.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Kevin,

please try with reinstall.

Regards

title: Crashes on G Watch Urbane

author: Sebastian Cucia
comment: The application has stopped working after less than 1 month. Now when I want to set up a face, that I used to use or a new face from the app, the app stops working after several seconds and on the screen of my watch I get the date and the hour on a grey background. It worked fine at the beginning but probably some update broke it. It is annoying and frustrating that something I have paid for is no longer working. Fix the application and I'd review my score or provide a full refund.

author: Larry Matter
comment: The app would get 5 stars, but it keeps crashing on my LG G watch R.  Different settings affect the frequency of crashing.  Not helpful when your watch says, "Unfortunately Styler has stopped..." instead of the time.  Multiple attempts to contact the dev have gone unanswered.

author: Christian Samsel
comment: Awesome customization. Needs a 'search' feature. Also, I have made 3 presets and when I hit Apply it says applied to watch, but the watch doesn't change..

author: David Goldfarb
comment: God figure. Won't buy again waste of money.
title: Crashes watch

author: Wesley Holt
comment: I love the simplicity of the app and seems to do as advertised.  I think the only thing currently that I would like to see is the ability to use the new Android 2.0 interactive modes and be able to add those to the watch face.

author: dave blanchard
comment: Phone battery stuck at 62% doesnt update. Otherwise a good app.
title: Battery status

author: Sirr Diarra
comment: Well reply to this..I want my money back. The watch faces from Styler keep freezing my moto 360. Refund the money now please. I am uninstalling your app from my phone now. I expect to get my refund asap. Thank you.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi,

you can try with reinstall.
If you still have error after new install you can contact us via email so we can make refund for you.

Regards

title: Styler has stopped

author: Josh Cody
comment: Why update, now it randomly force closes. Doesn't show correct phone battery life most of the time.UPDATE: reinstall app and still force closes on my watch, nothing has helped since the update

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Josh,

Could you please send us an email with issue description so we can assist you quickly? We updated new version with some fixed bugs and big battery life improvement.UPDATE: Quick fix: try to reinstall the  Styler app.

Regards

author: Adam Krolik
comment: Crashes several times throughout the day
title: Great but crashes

author: Tyson Camenzuli
comment: Can't add in step counter to face, can't have analogue clock in wake mode and digital clock in off mode (They both appear on both screens). Few more changes and it would be the best app..

author: Dexter Groenink
comment: Seriously still no way to search presets? It's ridiculous that I have to scroll through hundreds of pages to find the preset that I'm looking for.

author: Micah Justice
comment: Been using this app for basically the entire time I've owned my 360, but over the last month, the phone battery percent won't update. Been stuck at 23% through phone resets, relinking the connection, and restarting the watch/watch face. I Like this app and this ISN'T a deal breaker for me, but for a paid app I expect it to work. Please fix.
title: Phone battery stuck at 23% for a month

author: Denis Yeremuk
comment: Keeps crashing each time I apply it on my Gear Live. Please give me refund!
title: Refund

author: David Ley
comment: Would love a few more options. Especially the date.  A DD/MM/YY option or even day/month or simply a 2 digit date option.
title: Simple and easy.

author: Daffe Lynz
comment: I can not get it to work on my galaxy gear 2 neo
title: Sad

author: Eric
comment: Keeps giving me a message that app stopped working.
title: Won't work

author: Tom Kliimre
comment: Would need just date form as "1 Januar" or "Januar 1", whitout the weekday.  Or simple numeric version like " 31.12.2015". Thanks.
title: Good app

author: Paula Gomez
comment: Keeps crashing and I have to Uninstaller and reinstall about once a day
title: Crashes

author: Brian Correll
comment: Can not make ambient mode just a black screen .  fix this and I will rate 5 star.

author: grzegorz szum
comment: Got Htc m8 and tried to set faces on my moto 360, not working at all, i have disconnect devices, connect them again, install program and no response, help

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi,

try this:

Go to Android Wear Application, open Settings and use Re-sync apps option. 
 If it does not work, please disconnect devices (watch and phone), 
uninstall our watch face, restart watch and connect device again, 
 then finally install our watch face.

Regards

title: Not working:(

author: Mimi Winn
comment: This app would be great but it would work then it would stop working need to be fixed!
title: Okay

author: Rich Eakin
comment: I've had it for awhile, love the battery life & developer support. Many options and a growing community!
title: Great look &  battery life

author: Mikia Storm
comment: I love that I can customize I would only ask for the option of also having step counter on the watch face.
title: Love it

author: Kayden Tyler
comment: Can't use my own pictures.
title: Nice but.....

author: Gina Yashere
comment: Great app. Made myself a nice watch face. Would be great if there was interactive function for weather etc.
title: Great

author: rod tibo
comment: Don't need any other faces its all there anytime anywhere! !!
title: Oh ya

author: Kathryn Marie
comment: So customizable, great presets to get you started.
title: Best watch app I've used
